snippet.title: As Fast As Possible - Gameplay Trailer [4K]
snippet.description:
Now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1512350/As_Fast_As_Possible/

“Current status of Early Access

The current status of early access includes 10 single player levels, in which the goal is to master the levels as fast as possible. During the level a timer runs in which you must have passed the level. For each level there is a leaderboard with the fastest times. Difficult jumps, ice slides and wallrunns awaid you.

Multiplayer
the multiplayer is currently still in a very early stage, but is still playable.
Together with your friends or strangers you can compete against each other and show who is the better jump 'n runner. An online map contains 3 levels in which you have to master jump 'n run courses. After each course there are points depending on the placement. The winner is the one with the most points in the end. In the game mode "Hit" you can push other players”

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Sgu7SKDcKn
Register as Beta-Tester!
